points.name: Feed Fish
points.description:
To complete the EE, you'll need to follow these steps:
First, gather explosive equipment like grenades, semtex, or C4.
Next, locate schools of fish in any of the bodies of water located on or around Ashika Island.
Then, throw your explosive into the water to cook the fish, and you'll be able to harvest them.
After you've collected the fish, head over to this place and look for the hungry seal.
Interact with the seal to feed it, and the seal will reward you by spitting out other explosives such as Claymores or Killstreaks like Precision Airstrikes.

points.name: Power Plant Secret Room
points.description:
You'll need to hit four switches in a specific order to unlock this additional loot room.
The first switch you need to hit is on the wall to your right.
There are three more switches on the walls, and you'll want to hit them in the order you reach them.

points.name: Display Stand
points.description: To complete Easter Egg, find and pick up all three masks, then place them on the Display Stand near Tsuki Castle's main building. Kill all agents that spawn in the room during the 'Final Test', and when the last enemy is defeated, your squad will be rewarded with a Loadout Drop Marker and free loot.
